page.title: 08FAMILY SURVEY,BOURNE END.
page.content: (SAMPLE:166 CLAYTONS SCHOOL FAMILIES) The average family consists of 2/3 males and 2 females. Few families have any other relation living with them.All fathers and 70.5% of mothers are employed.Of these,79.5% of fathers go to work by car,but only 14% of mothers. Only 11.6% use public transport.52% of mothers work in Bourne End,25% of fathers work in London.Most families own a pet.Over 50% own a goldfish,49% a dog and 36.5% a cat.Only 23% shop mainly for food locally.43% shop in High Wycombe,which has 3 large supermarkets.97% of local people use the river Thames.93% prefer to walk along the banks and feed the birds.44% prefer to fish,37% to swim and 46% to cycle by the river.2.4% do not use the river at all.
